title: Is conventional mathematics methods that are taught in schools are justified? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve been puzzling over your question since I first came across it. As I understand right- and left-wing politics, the labels refer to opposing positions on policy issues that are related to the liberal-conservative continuum of ideologies. I don’t see that addition to left or right is at all related to this concept except in the sense that left-wing notions are often associated with change and addition left to right might represent change from the more conservative right to left method. Such a cognitive habit might have implications for other policies, but, at present, I don’t see how.
